name: Brewblossoms
desc: Brewblossom pollen is a key ingredient in brewing Aphimead, while Brewblossoms themselves are known to possess spirits... Whenever someone strays too close, the plants will mercilessly close their petals.

imgDesc.text: Brewblossom pollen is a key ingredient in brewing Aphimead, while Brewblossoms themselves are known to possess spirits... Whenever someone strays too close, the plants will mercilessly close their petals.

Some Brewblossoms will wither due to a lack of nutrients. When this happens, you must
instruct Brewblossom Aphids to replenish their energy...
